title: Metta Sandiford-Artest on Potential Investment Fund (Podcast)
itunes:title: Metta Sandiford-Artest on Potential Investment Fund (Podcast)
description:
Hosts Michael Barr and Scarlet Fu are joined by former NBA star, Metta Sandiford-Artest, formerly known as Metta World Peace. Their wide-ranging conversation focused on his various business interests through his Artest Management Group, and his plans to launch a large investment fund.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
